EmailTemplate.name: Remediation Completion Email Notification
EmailTemplate.Body:
Hello,
This email is to inform you that the access for $nativeIdentity within the application $application has been revoked as a part of the Use It or Lose It Initiative. This means you have not accessed the account or access within the application for an extended period of time. Please use the Remediation Reversal module FAQ to request the lost access again. Also refer to the Deloitte Use it or Lose It FAQ to understand how the whole process works.
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying revocation completion.
EmailTemplate.Subject: Use It or Lose It Revocation Complete for $identityName within $application
